summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1651, for the improvement of Thirty-seventh Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from the south margin of Hanford Street to the south margin of Court Street, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks, together with water mains of proper dimensions and materials, and such other appurtenances as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 17453 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
